MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Llanfaethlu and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:24AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:32PM on 1st November 2020.
